text: Heather Rattray (born April 25, 1965) is an American actress who has starred in several movies and soap operas. Her acting career began when she was 11 years old, when she was discovered by a film producer. She has appeared in several family features co-starring with Robert Logan, such as The Sea Gypsies, Across the Great Divide and two of the Wilderness Family film series. Rattray portrayed Lily Walsh on the soap, As the World Turns from 1989 to 1992 has also had a recurring role on Guiding Light.
